name: Vidya Dash
description:
Platformer/shooter inspired by classic arcade games like Donkey Kong, Pac Man, etal Slug, Space Invaders and others.

11 levels consisting of 4 boards + 2 bonus boards, 2 boss boards, dual pistols, an automatic rifle, an arcade mode and a trial/star mode! Tight controls and fun gunplay!

Featuring sprite art from Jennifer D'aww's (@GMShivers) Patreon Sprite packs. Music mixed by James Opie (@Nihilore)
